claims.object: Area of the cross section of the steel tube

surface_layer.definition: The area of the shape formed when the steel tube is cut perpendicularly to its axis.

deep_layer.mechanism: Determines the amount of material available to resist applied forces.
deep_layer.origin: Calculated from the outer and inner diameters of the steel tube.

examples: 0.294 square inches for a 1-inch nominal diameter schedule 40 steel tube

citations: ASTM Steel Tube Pipe Section Properties - Engineers Edge
